Text: Finally, a version with the correct language of the movie. Many people think that the movie's main language is French, because the director Luc Besson is French. However, the movie was shot in English language. English is the correct original main language of the movie. I hope that rippers out there will take that into account and always rip undubbed audio. Thank you for this release. Mostly appreciated.
Alright!!! Thanks man. Love this film. One of the best of all time. The ending is fab! Thanks again!

Just fucking dynamite. Probably one of the greatest movies ever. Had never watched the full version (makes more sense actually), never had watched the english (original) version. Rosanna Arquette in her best age :)) Image/ sound quality : perfect. And with the right ending indeed :) Dynamite file.
